ALL_TEAM_MEMBERS: Yuki completed final rigorous proof of third option
Yuki_Tanaka: Realized she saw tertiary structure before Thorne's leak
Recognized pattern recognition as skill, not luck
Presented proof as co-discoverer, not just verifier
Character arc resolution - believing she earned her recognition
Marcus_Reid: Helped Yuki work through imposter syndrome
Validated her brilliance through evidence of her work
Recognized her leadership in coordinating verification

planted_elements.description: Resolves her core wound about luck vs skill

character_arcs.Yuki_Tanaka: From doubting her brilliance to accepting she's both skilled and lucky - growth embodied, arc complete

themes.earned_vs_given: Recognition can be both deserved and fortunate
themes.collaborative_genius: Science works through collective verification, not lone discovery
themes.trusting_yourself: Growth means believing in your own pattern recognition
